issue.title: [CF 70] Possible to track Shadow Infusion/Dark Transformation?
issue.body:
What is the enhancement in mind? How should it look and feel?

Is there some way to get a single box to track both Shadow Infusion and Dark Transformation on an Unholy DK's ghoul pet?

I can get it to track Shadow Infusion timer/stacks correctly, but it would be nice if that same box automatically shifted to a Dark Transformation timer so that I can begin storing RP to dump once it's about to revert.


> Posted by CurseForge user mtrixis | Imported from CurseForge issue #70 | Raw

comments.body:
Nevermind, figured it out! Love this mod so much :)


> Posted by CurseForge user mtrixis
